alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Burnett; Douglas; Sawyer; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Bayfield, southeastern Douglas, Washburn, east central Burnett and northwestern Sawyer Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Spooner, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spooner, Hayward, Trego, Cable, Wascott, Minong, Gordon, Seeley, Namekagon Lake, Springbrook, Spooner Lake, Mckenzie Lake, Totagatic Lake, Middle Eau Claire Lake, Lampson, Nelson Lake, Totagatic Flowage, Stanberry, Earl, and Upper Eau Claire Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
